1296530.name: Candy Combat
1296530.description:
WARNING: If you are on a diet, please leave this page.




DESCRIPTION
Immerse yourself in a world of sweets, which is full of delicious candy. Beat the odds as a sweet frog to find Pinkie and Gingerbread man, to whom you need to explain some things. The game has 12 sweet playable characters! Each character has its own very sweet story and some even sweet secrets!



The game is aimed at people who are interested in sweets and martial arts. During the game we can choose our sweetheart and then go to the famous "Candy Tournament".

The audiovisual setting of the game is extremely colourful and pleasing to the eye even for the most demanding players, in a word, the graphic designer sugar-coated as he could. The realistic image of sweets, for example cakes, in the game is remarkable. Exciting but very relaxing music spices up the fun.

Enter the world full of sweets and pleasant characters! Give some sweetness like Candyality! to your opponents! Lead one of them to a sweet victory in the Candy Tournament!

The advantages of the game:
- Candy elements!
- Chocolate-shaped health point!
- Relaxing music and gameplay!
- Candyality!
- 12 sweetly playable characters!
- Biscuits, biscuits, biscuits, biscuits again!
- yum-yum!



PLOT
Froggy loses his brother (Frog X) in the legendary Candy Tournament organized by Gingerbread Man once every 5 years. Frog X died at the paw of ruthless Pinkie. Froggy decides to go to Candy Island to take part in the tournament and avenge his brother's death (do not write in the reviews that the plot is stretched because it is not. It is based on real events).
1296530.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 繁体中文, 简体中文, 波兰语*, 俄语, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语, 匈牙利语, 阿拉伯语, 保加利亚语, 捷克语, 丹麦语, 芬兰语, 希腊语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 荷兰语, 日语, 韩语, 挪威语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 罗马尼亚语, 瑞典语, 泰语, 越南语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
